INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the plasma concentrations of the oxycodone due to increase of its metabolism by the inducer
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Possible adjustment of the dosage of oxycodone.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the plasma concentrations of the oxycodone
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical monitoring and possible adjustment of the dosage of oxycodone during the length of the treatment with the enzyme inhibitor.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the plasma concentrations of the oxycodone due to increase of its metabolism by the St Johns wort
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Possible adjustment of the dosage of the oxycodone
